trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> objects.
Use the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection> class to iterate through a collection of <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup> objects.

You can access this collection of objects using the <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.SectionGroups%2A> property or the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup.SectionGroups%2A> property.
The <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection> class is also used in the creation of custom types that extend the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup> class.
Adds a <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object to this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection"></xref> object.
By default, this method adds the specified <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup> object if it is not already contained within the collection.
The name of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object to be added.
The <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object to be added.
Clears the collection.
This method is a wrapper around the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseClear%2A> method.
Copies this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection"></xref> object to an array.
The array to copy the object to.
The index location at which to begin copying.
array is `null`.
The length of array is less than the value of plus index.
Gets the number of section groups in the collection.
An integer that represents the number of section groups in the collection.
Gets the specified <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object contained in the collection.
This method is a wrapper around the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseGet%2A> method.
The index of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object to be returned.
The <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object at the specified index.
Gets the specified <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object from the collection.
This method is a wrapper around the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseGet%2A> method.
The name of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object to be returned.
The <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object with the specified name.
name is null or an empty string ("").
Gets an enumerator that can iterate through the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection"></xref> object.
An <xref href="System.Collections.IEnumerator"></xref> that can be used to iterate through the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection"></xref> object.

Gets the key of the specified <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object contained in this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection"></xref> object.
The index of the section group whose key is to be returned.
The key of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object at the specified index.
Used by the system during serialization.
The <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection.GetObjectData%2A> method is used during serialization; that is, when persisting configuration data to a configuration file.
The applicable <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object.
The applicable <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext"></xref> object.
Gets the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object whose index is specified from the collection.
The index of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object to be returned.
The <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object at the specified index.
In C#, this property is the indexer for the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"></xref> class.
Gets the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object whose name is specified from the collection.
The name of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object to be returned.
The <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object with the specified name.
In C#, this property is the indexer for the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"></xref> class.

Gets the keys to all <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> objects contained in this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection"></xref> object.
A <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.KeysCollection"></xref> object that contains the names of all section groups in this collection.

Removes the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object whose name is specified from this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection"></xref> object.
The name of the section group to be removed.

Removes the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object whose index is specified from this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection"></xref> object.
The index of the section group to be removed.
